name: Wild Guns Reloaded
description: Wild Guns Reloaded is a fast-paced arcade-style shooter, mixing the Wild West with steampunk. Play as Clint, Annie, Doris, or Bullet the dog with his sentry drone. Grab some friends and play together for some four player action!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Dual-core processor running at 2.0GHz or higher. Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 11 supported GPU（GeForce GTX 400 series, or Radeon HD 6000 series） DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
